title: Definition of $$x P\left(x\right)$$
text: Now, we want to find $$x P\left(x\right)$$. In the table, we have the provided values for $$x P\left(x\right)$$ for $$x=0$$ and $$P(x)=0.2$$. Now, let's multiply the two together.

title: Determining $$x=0's$$ $$x P\left(x\right)$$
text: What is the value for $$x P\left(x\right)$$ for $$x=0$$?
